Description:
Detects the execution of certutil with certain flags that allow the utility to download files.

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Jonhnathan Ribeiro, oscd.community, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Download Via Certutil.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%http%' and (process_path like '%\certutil.exe' and original_file_name = 'certutil.exe') and (command like '%urlcache %' or command like '%verifyctl %'))
